None.Name: Necro Beam
None.Description: Every 4 seconds, unit fires a deadly ray that deals 550 damage to enemies in a 15m radius around its target, up to 830 in total. Knocks back small and medium units.

None.Name: Leech Guns
None.Description: Brings 4 turrets into action that each drain 100 life points from own units in range every second. A total of 3000 life points can be stored at once. As long as the stored life points last unit deals 50% more damage. Leeching will go on until deactivated.

en.Description:
Necro Beam: +60 damage per target, 90 in total
Leech Guns: +50% damage bonus

Necro Beam: +30 damage per target, 40 in total
Leech Guns: +2000 storable lifepoints
